Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This class queries many questions and creates newsStories for newsMakers or it creates a graph for a certain newsMakers
    Author:
    cglen and Dean Hougen
